title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 34-2.16 - Compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 34-2.16 - Compliance

State Regulations

It is the responsibility of the clinical laboratory and the health services purveyor to establish, including by appropriate documentation, that any practice between the two entities complies with this Subpart. Upon request from the department, the health services purveyor and/or the clinical laboratory shall make such documentation available for inspection and copying. If requested by the clinical laboratory, such documentation shall be eligible for exemption from disclosure under the Freedom of Information Law (article 6 of the Public Officers Law), pursuant to the authority in section
89 (5)
of the Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
34-2.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
